login.title: Take back your day.
login.description: Sign in to see your dashboard with weather, activities, and news at a glance.
login.feature1.title: Targeted weather
login.feature1.desc: Click a day on your calendar to view its forecast.
login.feature2.title: Nearby news
register.title: Create your account in seconds.
register.description: Get a dashboard built for focused weather, activities, and local news all in one place.
register.feature1.title: Quick profile
register.feature1.desc: Create your login and find your data right away.
register.feature2.title: Smooth space
register.feature2.desc: Interface aligned with the dashboard, modern and readable.
